messages.content:
It doesn’t have to be like this.
I don’t accept that Britain is doomed to the most extreme version of Brexit backed by Theresa May. I won’t let the Conservatives take our NHS towards more cuts and privatisation. Not without a fight.
There’s so much at stake in this election and it’s in your hands.
I’m talking about your job. I’m talking about the future of our NHS and schools here in Manchester, Withington. I’m talking about our right to live, work and travel across Europe.
This election is about voting for what you believe in.
Unlike Jeremy Corbyn's Labour, the Liberal Democrats WILL fight to stop Theresa May’s extreme Brexit wrecking our country’s future.
And the way we’ll do it is simple.
If in two years’ time Theresa May brings us a bad Brexit deal, YOU should be able to vote on it and have the option to stay in the EU. If Theresa May brings back a poisoned apple, we shouldn’t have to eat it.
It’s your choice, it’s your future – help change it by voting Liberal Democrat on 8th June.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats will fight to stop Theresa May’s extreme Brexit wrecking our country’s future.

issues.health:
The Conservatives take our NHS towards more cuts and privatisation.
I’m talking about the future of our NHS.
